plot: A movie producer and a homeless man cross paths at the Cannes Film Festival, and in a short 24-hour period, changes each others lives forever.
title: One Day
plot_es: A movie producer and a homeless man cross paths at the Cannes Film Festival, and in a short 24-hour period, changes each others lives forever.
plot_en: A movie producer and a homeless man cross paths at the Cannes Film Festival, and in a short 24-hour period, changes each others lives forever.
